author: holiman
content:
<@403707149043105803> they replace the costs. So 700 becomes either 2600 (?) Or 100. However, they don't replace the extra costs, e.g. mem expansion or value-transfer-cost or create-new-account-cost, or, as you pointed out, the per-byte-cost of extcodecopy. Just the base-cost of 700 is modified.

And yes, staticcall to precompiles eip becomes moot, since 2929 already makes it 100. 

Same w sload, it becomes either cheaper or more expensive. Check out the eip examples/testcases for more detailed info
